description: Installation of eight additional roof windows and alterations to internal staircase to form an office, storage and a library to existing attic space.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Existing Elevations 200/MKD/P04, Existing Plans 200/MKD/P03, Existing & Proposed Site Plans 200/MKD/P02, OS Plan 200/MKD/P01, Proposed street elevations 200/MKD/P08, Design & Access Statement dated December 2018; Received 04/01/2019, Existing & Proposed Site Plans 200/MKD/P07 Rev A, Proposed Attic & Roof Plan 200/MKD/P06 Rev A, Proposed Ground & First Floor Plans 200/MKD/P05 Rev A; Received 11/01/2019) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The development hereby approved shall only be used for the purposes specified on the approved drawings and ancillary to the main use of the building.
